DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : SEMIFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; NAME GAME
DOC.TEXT: World Cup_final four nicknames ( with absolutely no apologies to ESPN ' s Chris Berman ) : Bulgaria : Air Yordan Letchkov , Hristo ( Watch ) Stoitchkov . Sweden : Magnus ( Opus ) Hedman , Roland ( On the River ) Nilsson , Roger ( Iron ) Ljung , Pontus ( Blue Light Special ) Kamark , Hakan ( Cloudy and ) Mild . Italy : Dino ( the Dinosaur ) Baggio , Alessandro ( Cutting ) Costacurta , Paolo ( Karl ) Maldini , Roberto ( Chocolate ) Mussi , Nicola ( Ernie and ) Berti , Gianfranco ( Budd ) Zola , Lorenzo ( Just a ) Minotti . Brazil : There are laws against giving nicknames to players whose only names are nicknames . BILL PLASCHKE
